availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Owen County, Kentucky, farmer. Married to Louisa Grumamier. Native of Prussia. Father of William Grumamier, Henry Grumamier, Fritz Grumamier, Samuel Grumamier, Louis Grumamier, Mary Grumamier, Line Grumamier, and Lena Grumamier. Farmer in Owen County in 1870.

ab.bibl:
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Owen, New Liberty Precinct, p. 8-9.
Find A Grave, "Simeon Grumamier (June 14, 1821-August 22, 1901)," Memorial #77775576, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/77775576 (accessed April 12, 2018).
